hero.title: About SkillBridge
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to connect learners with expert mentors worldwide, making quality mentorship accessible to everyone.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: SkillBridge was born from a simple observation: too many talented people struggle to find the right mentorship, while experienced professionals want to share their knowledge but lack the platform to do so effectively.
story.paragraph2: Founded in 2023, we set out to bridge this gap by creating a platform that makes mentorship accessible, affordable, and effective for everyone involved.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to connect thousands of learners with expert mentors across various industries, helping people achieve their career goals and personal development objectives.
story.missionText: To democratize access to quality mentorship and create a global community of learners and mentors.
